Reason 2: Payment Processor Limitations

The real blocker: Chinese banks and payment processors.

  • Chinese UnionPay blocks gambling transactions
  • Alipay/WeChat Pay prohibit gambling use

Free vs. Real Money: When to Switch

Practice First: 1 Week Free Play

Why practice matters:
– Learn crash timing (cashout decisions)
– Test different games (Aviator vs. Crash X vs. Speed Crash)
– Build intuition for variance
– Develop strategy without risking money

Our recommendation: Play free for at least 1 week before depositing.

When to Deposit: Signs You're Ready

✅ Ready if:
– You understand crash mechanics (multiplier, auto-cashout, variance)
– You've practiced for 1+ week
– You have a strategy (bet sizing, cashout targets)
– You're treating it as entertainment, not income

❌ Not ready if:
– Chasing losses (betting more to recover)
– Betting more than you can afford to lose
– Playing when emotional (stressed, angry, tired)
– No clear strategy (random bets)

First Deposit: Start Small

Recommended:
– Min deposit: $50-100 (300-700 CNY)
– First bets: $1-2 per round (7-14 CNY)
– Goal: Learn with real money, minimize risk

Avoid:
– Depositing more than you can afford to lose
– Chasing welcome bonuses (they have wagering requirements)
– Playing drunk or emotional
